transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Ah sir, namaskaram, IndiaMART-le irunthu call pannirukken sir.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Ah sir, morning-e idha connect pannikalaam one hour-kulla apdintra maari solliruntheenga. Sir, enna sir pending-le irukkunga sir?
Customer: Madam, aama madam.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Madam, sir, slight issue madam, hospital-le irukken madam.
Executive: Sir, unga voice break aagudhu. Total-a enakku clear-a kekkalainga sir. Enna solreenga apdinnu sonnute.
Customer: Madam, slight issue madam. Hospital-le vandhurukken madam. Poi kupten madam.
Executive: Ah, seri ok sir ok. Paathuttu next text mattum share panna mudiyumaa? Enna madam?
Customer: Illa, seri, text mattum panna mudiyumaa? Sir, neenga solradhu total-a enakku clear-a kekkala. Hospital-le irukkeenga-ndradhu mattum thaan kekkudhu.
Customer: Madam, aama madam. Madam, innaikku mudiyaadhu madam. Naalaikku vandhu, veetukku poi ready pannikondraen madam.
Executive: Ah, seri ok. Neenga enna-ndradha paathuttu call pannunga sir.
Customer: Ok ok. Seri sir.
Executive:
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has pending work with IndiaMART.

- Customer is currently at the hospital.



Resolution:

- Customer will complete the work tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after checking the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pending work, hospital, follow up
